entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A fellow student and opponent in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Another competitor in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who has experience with the wizarding world.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The trophy being competed for in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: four-point spell
entities.description: A magical technique used by Harry to navigate.

relationships.description: Harry and Cedric are opponents in the Triwizard Tournament.
Harry and Krum are also opponents in the tournament.
Moody is a teacher at Hogwarts who has taught Harry.
